mapper.select: SELECT sum(o_price) as monthprice FROM orders WHERE o_date>=TRUNC(sysdate,'MM') AND o_date<LAST_DAY(sysdate)
SELECT sum(o_price) as dayprice FROM orders WHERE to_char(o_date, 'DD') = to_char(sysdate,'DD')
select sum(userdelcount) as delcount from userkeeprate
select count(u_id) as usercount from usertable

SELECT sum(o_price) as totalprice, sum(o_count) as count, to_char(o_date, 'YYYY-MM') as month_date FROM orders WHERE o_date>= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-01-01' AND o_date< TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31' GROUP BY to_char(o_date, 'YYYY-MM') order by month_date

SELECT sum(o_price) as price, sum(o_count) as count, to_char(o_date, 'MM-DD') as day_date FROM orders WHERE o_date>=TRUNC(sysdate,'MM') AND o_date<LAST_DAY(sysdate) GROUP BY to_char(o_date, 'MM-DD') order by day_date
select sum(o.o_count) as count , p.ca_smallcate as cate from orders o, product p where o.p_num = p.p_num group by ca_smallcate
select pname,count from ( select p.p_name as pname,sum(o.o_count) as count from orders o, product p where o.p_num = p.p_num group by p_name order by count desc ) where rownum <= 5
